question: What is the name of the scheme launched by the Agriculture Ministry, to assist cooperatives in creation of healthcare infrastructure?
explanation:
A new scheme named ‘AYUSHMAN SAHAKAR’ has been launched by the Agriculture Ministry, to assist cooperatives in creation of healthcare infrastructure in the country.
It is formulated by the National Cooperative Development Corporation (NCDC). Under the scheme, NCDC would extend term loans to prospective cooperatives totalling Rs.10,000 Crore in the coming years, for creating health facilities.
